sentences.sContent: His job includes looking after under-21 teams.
sentences.sCn: 他的职责包括照管21岁以下球队。

sentences.sContent: The curriculum includes courses in computing.
sentences.sCn: 课程内容包括计算机技术。

sentences.sContent: ...When a group of craftsmen expends to include more members...
...Responsibilities generally include supervising study spaces to ensure that a quiet atmosphere is maintained...
...These include government financing for scientific research...
...Good conversation skills include much more than simply talking to others...
...The other measures include restricting portion sizes...
...They will include plenty of names no one has yet heard of...
...These traditional dishes include fish and chips...
...W: Then you'll have to include that in your point...
...The consequences of getting caught are serious and may include a "O" on a test or assignment...
...They include the Center for Internet Addiction Recovery and the Center for Internet Behavior...
...Several have since made pledges to include organic fabrics in their lines...
...include things such as having a challenging and interesting job...
...The most common complaints include filled parking lots...

remMethod.val: in(进入) ＋ clud(关) ＋ e → 关进里面 → 包括， 包含； 参考： exclude(vt. 把…排除在外)

words.tran: 包括（include的过去式和过去分词）

trans.tranOther: if one thing includes another, the second thing is part of the first
